alert.note: Alert for Deuel (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:55PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Deuel County through 715 PM CDT... At 651 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Toronto, or 14 miles east of Estelline, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Astoria around 655 PM CDT. Brandt around 700 PM CDT. Lake Cochrane Rec Area around 705 PM CDT. Gary around 710 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
